message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $120 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $85 for it. What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $110.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $110 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $95. Let's see if we can find common ground.
I can see you're serious about getting a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to think about my costs. I can offer it to you for $105.
Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $105 is still above my budget. I'm sticking with my previous offer of $95.  I believe this is a fair price for both of us.
